sentences.en: Brian's old-fashioned cuisine was unmatched for flavour.
sentences.cn: 布赖恩的传统风味菜肴味道简直无与伦比。

sentences.en: But love means unmatched intelligence for those who understand love.
sentences.cn: 但是对那些懂得爱的人而言,爱是独一无二的明智.

sentences.en: DISC BRAKES , 279 mm diameter , self - adjusting. Unmatched braking power.
sentences.cn: 盘式制动器:直径279毫米, 自我 调节,无以匹敌的制动力.

sentences.en: Generally a planar triangulation method is used to enclose the unmatched contours.
sentences.cn: 通常,对末端轮廓都是以平面三角剖分封闭端面.

sentences.en: He gulped down knowledge with unmatched enthusiasm.
sentences.cn: 他如饥似渴地接收知识.

sentences.en: He had a talent unmatched by any other politician of this century.
sentences.cn: 他的才华是本世纪其他政坛人物所望尘莫及的。

sentences.en: His skill in chess is unmatched in the school.
sentences.cn: 他的棋艺在全校是独一无二的.

sentences.en: Our passion, collaboration and perseverance are unmatched in the industry.
sentences.cn: 我们的热情 、 协作、以及毅力在业界无可比拟.

sentences.en: Reproduction of the image quality is unmatched, and have very good stability.
sentences.cn: 其图像再现的质量是无可比拟的, 且有很好的稳定性.

sentences.en: The grandeur of the Great Wall is unmatched.
sentences.cn: 长城的壮观是独一无二的.

sentences.en: The integrity of his scholarship was, I believe, unmatched at Harvard.
sentences.cn: 其大家风范, 在哈佛无人可以望其项背.

sentences.en: The quintessential entertainer - entrepreneur wielded unmatched influence over our childhood.
sentences.cn: 娱乐业商人的典范,对我们的童年产生了巨大的影响.

sentences.en: The sheer quantity of life here is unmatched anywhere in the oceans.
sentences.cn: 炽热的阳光照射在海面,成为海洋生物的能量及营造了一栖息的乐土.

sentences.en: There is just great, unmatched functionality in this product.
sentences.cn: 有太好, 该产品无与伦比的功能.

sentences.en: They gulp down knowledge with unmatched enthusiasm.
sentences.cn: 他们如饥似渴地吸收知识.

words.tran_cn: 无与伦比的；不相配的；无匹敌的

trans.tran_cn: 无敌的，无比的，不相配的，无前，曾无与二
